articles.description: India-born Nav Bhatia, who became the first-ever fan to be inducted in the Basketball Hall of Fame, spoke about his experience at the ceremony, seeing his turban in the museum and what it all means to him.
articles.content:
“I am really blessed and humbled that this has happened and I am proud that this has happened to a guy from India, a Sikh from India, a fan of Toronto Raptors."
On May 15, 2021, the 69-year-old Indi… [+10033 chars]

articles.title: Neymar hits back at 'lies' from Nike over terminated sponsorship deal - ESPN India
articles.description: Brazilian player Neymar hit back at sportswear maker Nike Inc. on Friday for lying about the reasons for terminating its sponsorship deal with him.
articles.content: Neymar hit back at sportswear maker Nike Inc. on Friday, saying the company's statement that it terminated an endorsement deal because he refused to cooperate with an investigation into the alleged s… [+2256 chars]

articles.title: Ashwin opens up on sleepless nights during IPL after family members tested positive for Covid-19 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: "I was playing matches without any sleep. Since I found it taxing, I had to quit IPL and go home midway"
